description:
With the fast development of the Internet, there are more and more online educational platforms nowadays. As the biggest Internet educational platform in China, how does Hujiang.com survive in the severe competition? On August 13, we visited this famous company in Zhangjiang Hi-tech Park and got the answer.

 

Zhitao Chang, vice president of Hujiang.com, told us that in order to meet users’ needs, Hujiang has been mainly developing three functions.

 

Hujiang Blog is for users to share study resources freely, while users can buy books from Hujiang Online Store, which is very convenient for most users.

 

The biggest advantage of Hujiang is that it provides various articles in both English and Chinese every day.

 

Furthermore, it also supports a dictionary function for English learners.

 

The Hujiang staff are still working hard to improve the platform. In order to have a better online learning atmosphere, Hujiang has become a “no advertising” website. They have also developed products like CC Talk and Hujiang Dictionary to make English learning easier and more interesting.

 

Hujiang now has more than three million users. This is the best payoff for their hard work!
